short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate Cibus budget for the rest of the month, and show discounts on menu items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cibus-Sodexo users with a monthly budget can use this extension to easily calculate how much they can spend per day in order to not finish the budget before the end of the month. This extension can calculate the remaining working days in a month while taking weekends and vacations into account.
A secondary feature is showing actual price after discount on menu items for restaurants that provide a discount for the customer.
